home_page.title: Painting Equipment Repair
home_page.intro: Service Center IP TECHSNAB is a certified center for the repair and maintenance of Wiwa painting equipment in the Republic of Kazakhstan. Our specialists, who have completed mandatory training at the WIWA Wilhelm Wagner GmbH & Co. factory in Germany, provide service and warranty maintenance for all models of painting equipment.
services_list: Technological consultation from professional and competent specialists
Selection of consumables and spare parts
Technical maintenance and cleaning of equipment
Recommendations for further maintenance and use
home_page.workshop_intro: Our own authorized workshop for painting equipment repair allows us to maintain a large stock of necessary spare parts. A constant warehouse reserve of consumables in our specialized service center helps to carry out repairs almost 'same day'. If necessary, our specialists will diagnose and repair painting equipment from other manufacturers and brands.
home_page.warranty_intro_1: The warranty period for Wiwa equipment, set by the official manufacturer, is 12 months. However, if the operating rules described in the User Manual are not followed, free warranty service is not provided. Therefore, it is strongly recommended to read all points of the Manual and the rules for using the purchased painting equipment.
home_page.warranty_intro_2: Wiwa warranty service is provided only upon presentation of the warranty card and the original purchase receipt by the client.
warranty_void_list: if contamination is detected due to improper washing, cleaning, or lubrication of the equipment;
if the equipment is opened or disassembled by a person who is not a representative of the service center;
in case of improper use and care of the equipment;
if damaged during transportation carried out by the client;
if low-quality paint materials are used during spraying with the equipment;
if seals, stickers, or tags are missing or damaged.
home_page.recommendation: To avoid unpleasant situations, it is strongly recommended to learn all the nuances of working with the purchased equipment, and also to thoroughly clean the painting equipment after each use. Careful care of the devices and accessories is the key to a long service life of the painting equipment.
home_page.outro_1: Service Center IP Techsnab - guarantees high-quality repairs and compliance with all obligations.
home_page.outro_2: Exclusive official dealer and service center of Wiwa in the Republic of Kazakhstan.

sandblasting_page.title: Sandblasting Equipment Repair
sandblasting_page.intro: The "TechSnab" company provides professional repair and maintenance services for sandblasting (abrasive blasting) equipment of all types - injector and pressure. We work with all leading manufacturers.
repair_list: Full diagnostics of malfunctions and defect analysis
Replacement and selection of abrasive blasting nozzles (boron carbide, tungsten)
Repair and replacement of metering valves (KPD, KP)
Replacement of sandblasting hoses, fittings, and quick-release couplings
Repair of remote control systems (RC) and air supply valves
Cleaning and replacement of moisture-oil separator filters
sandblasting_page.warning_text: Timely replacement of consumables (especially nozzles) and the use of high-quality, sifted, and dry abrasive significantly extend the life of the equipment and save you money on costly repairs.

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.intro: Service Center "TechSnab" offers a full range of diagnostics, repair, and maintenance services for Wiwa painting equipment and other leading manufacturers.
directions_list: Repair of painting equipment of any complexity
Selection and supply of original spare parts and consumables
Training of personnel on equipment operation rules
services_page.why_us_text: Our team consists of certified engineers trained at manufacturing plants in Germany. We use only original components and provide an official warranty for all types of work performed.

contacts_page.title: Contacts
contacts_page.intro: Contact us in any convenient way for a consultation or to call a technician. We are always ready to help!
